name: Consulting Agency "Rumyantsev & partners" LLC
legal: Limited Liability Company under Russian law
goal:
Rendering an efficient structured GR support to Russian and international companies and business associations with activities in Russia, Eurasian Economic Union (EEU) and European Union (EU);
Providing consultancy in the sphere of external communications for business projects, efficient interaction with stakeholders and business partners;
Promoting Russia-EU business dialog in efficient and transparent formats
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Energy, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Communications on Energy Union, European Energy Security Strategy, Energy Policy and Legislation Plan, Environmental Regulation, Climate; Regional Co-operation; Relevant policy implementation, public relations and communication activities.
Intellectual Property Protection and Regulation, Communication and Media Policy and Regulation
